synopsis.text: Tired of the chaos that love brings, Eita Kidou, a dedicated high school student, is determined to keep his focus solely on his academic pursuits and his dream of attending medical school. However, his life takes an unexpected turn when Masuzu Natsukawa, the most beautiful girl in school, proposes a fake relationship to keep potential suitors at bay. To ensure Eita's cooperation, Masuzu threatens to reveal his most embarrassing secrets. As Eita navigates this newfound fake romance, he must contend with the jealousy of his childhood friend, Chiwa, and the complications that arise from his new relationship status. In this whirlwind of love and deception, Eita must find a way to maintain his focus on his studies while managing the tumultuous relationships around him.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
